description: Researchers from Westlake University have developed the ‘FlyingToolbox,’ a drone system that exchanges tools mid-air with sub-centimeter precision. Using vision tracking, electromagnets, and AI airflow correction, it achieved 0.8 cm accuracy even under strong downwash. The innovation could transform aerial maintenance, construction, and rescue operations.
title: ‘FlyingToolbox’ Drone System Achieves Sub-Centimeter Accuracy in Mid-Air Tool Exchange

description: Using the James Webb Space Telescope, scientists have detected phosphine gas in the atmosphere of the brown dwarf Wolf 1130C, about 54 light-years away. The finding suggests phosphine can form in extreme, non-biological environments, challenging its status as a potential biomarker and reshaping how scientists search for alien life.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Detects Phosphine on Brown Dwarf Wolf 1130C

description: Bomb is a Telugu thriller exploring faith and human nature through an unusual death in a divided village. Directed by Vishal Venkat and starring Arjun Das, it offers a mix of suspense and satire. Streaming on Aha Video from October 10, 2025.
title: Bomb (2025) OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Thrilling Telugu Movie Online?

description: Astronomers using JWST and ALMA discovered a 20,000-light-year-long contrail in galaxy NGC 3627. Scientists believe it was carved by a massive black hole traveling through the galactic disk, leaving behind a turbulent scar of dust and gas that may offer new clues to galaxy evolution.
title: James Webb Telescope Spots Evidence of a Black Hole Carving a Massive Scar Through a Galaxy

description: Bob Odenkirk returns in Nobody 2, the thrilling sequel packed with action, humour, and heart. Releasing in 2025, the film follows Hutch Mansell’s new battle against a dangerous criminal network. With intense fights and deeper emotional layers, Nobody 2 promises to exceed fans’ expectations worldwide.
title: Nobody 2 Now Available for Rent on Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know About Bob Odenkirk’s Action Sequel

description: Raj Tarun’s Chiranjeeva arrives on Aha Video this November, bringing a powerful blend of action, emotion, and mythology. Directed by Abhinaya Krishna, the film tells the story of a man blessed with divine powers who faces destiny’s ultimate test in a world full of chaos and courage.
title: Raj Tarun’s Chiranjeeva Premieres on Aha Video This November

description: The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority has lifted its four-year ban on crypto exchange-traded notes (ETNs), enabling retail investors to gain exposure to cryptocurrencies without directly holding them. The move follows years of market development and positions the UK alongside other jurisdictions adopting regulated crypto products. Analysts expect the decision to boost adoption, with tax-efficient options like pensions and ISAs set to include ETNs from 2025 and 2026, respectively.
title: UK Ends Four-Year Ban on Crypto ETNs as FCA Expands Retail Access

description: LinkedIn has updated its Open to Work feature, allowing users to add their notice period and expected salary to profiles. These optional details are visible only to recruiters, helping streamline hiring by matching availability and compensation expectations. Candidates who define roles, update profiles, and enable the feature are more likely to get callbacks, with chances of recruiter messages potentially doubling. Users can control badge visibility, choosing between “Recruiters only” or “All LinkedIn members” to manage privacy.
title: LinkedIn's Open to Work Feature Now Lets You Show Your Notice Period, Salary Expectations to Recruiters

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G is all set to go official on Friday, October 10. As we wait for the reveal, Samsung has revealed the camera details of the phone. It is teased to come with a 50-megapixel rear camera sensor with optical image stabilisation (OIS) and a 13-megapixel selfie camera. The handset will have a 6.7-inch display and an IP54-rated build.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera With OIS Teased Ahead of Launch

description: At India Mobile Congress 2025, Samsung showcased its “AI for All” vision across five experience zones, highlighting Galaxy AI, SmartThings, and AI-powered security and education platforms. The company emphasised its commitment to building an inclusive, connected future through technology. Samsung also demonstrated its 5G and AI-driven network solutions at the event.
title: Samsung Showcases AI for All Vision With Interactive Demos at IMC 2025

description: Ubisoft scrapped its plans for an Assassin's Creed game set in the Reconstruction-era US after the Civil War over fear of political backlash, according to a new report. Citing sources familiar with the matter, the report claimed the game would have featured a former slave as the assassin protagonist taking on Templars and members of the Ku Klux Klan.
title: Ubisoft Cancelled Post-US Civil War-Era Assassin's Creed Game Over Fears of Political Backlash: Report

description: Google has silently started rolling out the Wear OS 6 update to Pixel Watch 3 and Pixel Watch 2. The update is available for both Bluetooth and LTE variants of the Pixel Watch 2 and Watch 3. It includes Material 3 Expressive design language with colour themes, typography. It also said to offer improved battery life over the existing Wear OS 5.
title: Google Pixel Watch 3, Pixel Watch 2 Finally Get Wear OS 6 Update With Redesigned Interface, New Features

description: At India Mobile Congress 2025, Qualcomm showcased innovations across smartphones, AI PCs, vehicles, and drones. Highlights included Royal Enfield’s Flying Flea C6 electric bike powered by Snapdragon chips, TechEagle’s Vertiplane X3 drone, and Snapdragon-powered AR glasses. The company also displayed its AI-enabled X85 5G Modem-RF system and seamless 4G–5G network switching tech.
title: Qualcomm’s Big Showcase at IMC 2025: Drones, AR Glasses, Royal Enfield’s First EV, and More

description: Razorpay and OpenAI, along with National Payments Corporation, are coming together to bring "India's first agentic payments" solution to the country. Using the company's payments stack, people will soon be able to search, explore, and buy groceries and other products directly through the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered chatbot. Currently, the feature is in the pilot stage. However, Razorpay is allowing people to sign up for early access.
title: Razorpay Partners OpenAI, NPCI to Launch Agentic Payments at Global Fintech Fest 2025

description: Coinbase has secured regulatory approval to expand its staking services to New York, allowing residents to earn rewards on crypto assets such as Ether and Solana. The move follows recent rulings in several US states dismissing lawsuits against the exchange’s staking model. While New York’s decision highlights progress for Coinbase, tensions remain with other regulators, as states like Oregon continue to raise concerns over unregistered securities offerings.
title: Coinbase Gets Regulator’s Nod to Launch Crypto Staking Services in New York

description: OnePlus recently announced that it will unveil its latest Android 16-based OxygenOS 16 on October 16 in India. While announcing the date, the tech firm also teased the design of the operating system (OS). Now, a dedicated landing page for the OxygenOS 16 has gone live on the OnePlus India website, revealing the new connectivity and multitasking capabilities it will offer. OnePlus 15 is widely expected to ship with Android 16-based OxygenOS 16.
title: OnePlus Teases OxygenOS 16 Design, Features Ahead of October 16 Debut

description: Microsoft will stop supporting Windows 10 on October 14, which is next week. The operating system (OS) will not receive new updates once it reaches the end of support. However, there’s still a way to receive updates, enabling them to use their PCs for another year without being forced to upgrade to Windows 11. Here's how to enroll in the Windows 10 Extended Security Updates (ESU) programme.
title: Windows 10 Support Ends on October 14: Here's How to Receive Extended Updates for Free

description: Customers can purchase premium ultrabooks at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates during the ongoing Amazon Diwali sale. While these devices usually command a premium price, the sale event offers great discounts and deals on offerings from top brands. The e-commerce giant has partnered with Axis Bank, Bobcard, IDFC First Bank, and RBL Bank to offer up to a 10 percent instant discount.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Best Deals on Premium Ultrabooks You Can Buy During the Sale

description: Bethesda has announced a showcase for the Fallout Day on October 23, where it will bring updates on the Fallout franchise. The Fallout Day broadcast could bring news on Fallout 76 and the second season of the Fallout TV series on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Bethesda Confirm Fallout Day Broadcast for October 23: What to Expect

description: At India Mobile Congress 2025, Ericsson showcased 5G and AI-led innovations, including an AI-powered robot dog that inspects driverless railcars for defects. It also unveiled Annapurti, a 5G-enabled grain ATM for efficient food distribution, and StethoECG, a wireless digital stethoscope with ECG support. Ericsson’s FWA tech now serves 8.4 million users in India.
title: IMC 2025: Ericsson Showcases AI-Powered Robotic Dog That Inspects Automated Railcars

description: Oppo Find X9 series, which is scheduled to be unveiled on October 16, has now been listed on the company’s online store. The Oppo website has revealed that its upcoming handsets will be available in four storage options and colourways. Apart from its new phones, the Chinese smartphone maker will also unveil the Oppo Pad 5 and Watch S on October 16.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Storage Variants Revealed; Leaked Hands-On Images Suggest Design

description: Vivo’s OriginOS 6 teaser on Weibo showcases a major UI overhaul for its Android 16-based system, featuring an animated lockscreen clock, translucent numbers, smoother app animations, stacked notifications, and landscape pop-up windows. The update also introduces AI-powered tools like Live Photo AI Erase. Upcoming Vivo X300 series phones will include these features, along with Shake to Share for easy content sharing, Little V Memory for efficient data management, and Atomic Motion 6.0.
title: OriginOS 6 Teaser Hints at Resemblance to iOS 26; Company Reveals AI Features on Vivo X300 Series

description: Samsung’s upcoming “Auto Answer with AI” feature, leaked images of an early One UI 8.5 build suggest. It will likely let Galaxy phones automatically handle calls when users are busy or in Do Not Disturb mode. The AI can answer after a set duration, respond in real time, and provide a transcript afterwards. Users can customise call categories like spam or deliveries, and the feature can be disabled anytime via Call Settings.
title: Samsung Testing Galaxy AI Call Assist Feature With Automatic Call Screening on One UI 8.5: Report

description: Liquid Glass UI is Apple’s latest design language introduced in iOS 26 operating system. Apps like WhatsApp are now slowly adopting the new style to align with the design of iOS 26. WhatsApp for iOS 25.28.75 has reportedly brought Liquid Glass compatibility for select users.
title: WhatsApp's Liquid Glass Design Update Reportedly Rolls Out to Some Users

description: Bitcoin remained above $122,000 (roughly Rs. 1.08 crore) on Thursday as sentiment improved following dovish US Fed signals. Ethereum consolidated over $4,400 (roughly Rs. 3.9 lakh), with altcoins showing mixed moves. Analysts noted muted selling pressure and steady ETF inflows, while traders now await Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech for clues on the next leg of the rally.
title: Crypto Rally Slows as Bitcoin Consolidates Near $122,500 and Ethereum Maintains Momentum

description: EA Sports FC games have done little to move the needle in the last two years, but EA Sports FC 26 introduces two new gameplay presets to address the conflicting demands of its community. Authenticity is in focus in the manager mode, and Ultimate Team goes for a more competitive edge. You can't please everyone, but EA has certainly tried.
title: EA Sports FC 26 Review: For the Players

description: Google on Thursday announced the availability of the Pixel 10 Pro Fold and Pixel Buds 2a in India. The Mountain View, California-based tech giant introduced its Pixel 10 series at the Made by Google event in August. While the Pixel 10 and the Pro models were brought to the Indian market post-launch, there was no word on the availability of the top-of-the-line Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The company has announced that customers in India can now purchase the foldable handset, along with the new Pixel Buds 2a.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Pixel Buds 2a Go on Sale in India: See Price, Features and Launch Offers

description: Honor Magic 8 series will debut in China in mid-October, alongside the Magic Pad 3 lineup, new Watch 5 Pro, and Earbuds 4 TWS, the tech firm announced. The colourways for the upcoming smartphones and tablets have also been revealed. The Honor Magic 8 lineup will run on MagicOS 10, too. A Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset will power the upcoming Magic Pad 3 Pro, which will sport a 13.3-inch screen.
title: Honor Magic 8 Series Launch Date, Colourways Announced; to Debut Alongside Magic Pad 3 Lineup, Watch 5 Pro

description: Motorola will launch the Edge 70 in select regions on November 5, as confirmed by a teaser on its Poland page. The phone features a 4,800mAh battery and supports 68W wired fast charging. It is expected to have an “ultra slim” 6mm design, making it likely Motorola’s slimmest smartphone yet. The Edge 70 follows the global trend of ultra-thin smartphones with smaller batteries, similar to Samsung’s Galaxy S25 Edge and Apple’s iPhone Air.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Global Launch Date, Battery Capacity Confirmed Ahead of Debut

description: OpenAI has updated its Sora app policies to give copyright holders and users more control. Rightsholders must now opt in, rather than opt out, for their characters to appear in AI-generated videos, meaning many copyrighted characters could disappear. Users can also restrict how their likeness is used through new Cameo preference settings.
title: OpenAI Changes Sora App’s Policy for Copyright Holders, Gives Users More Control Over Cameos
Slim, Stylish, and Seriously Smart: Why the vivo V60e Is the Talk of the Festive Season

description: iQOO Pad 5e, iQOO Watch GT 2 and iQOO TWS 5 are confirmed to launch in China alongside the iQOO 15 smartphone on October 20. The company has started accepting pre-reservations for the new devices through Vivo's official website in China. The tablet is teased to feature a12.1-inch display with 2.8K resolution and144Hz refresh rate. It will come with a 10,000mAh battery.
title: iQOO Pad 5e, iQOO Watch GT 2 and iQOO TWS 5 Launch Date Announced; Will Debut Alongside iQOO 15

description: AnTuTu V11 beta was officially launched in September. Now, the company has released the list of flagship Android phones with the best CPU performance on the AnTuTu V11 beta version. The list reflects the results from the data collected between September 1 and 30. The recently unveiled Xiaomi 17 series managed to take the first three positions, thanks to the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. iQOO Neo 10 Pro+, Vivo X200 Ultra, Red Magic 10S Pro+, and Oppo Find X8 Ultra were also featured on the list.
title: Xiaomi 17 Series Takes Top Three Spots on AnTuTu V11 Performance Benchmark for Flagship Phones

description: Apple could enter the foldable phone segment next year with iPhone Fold. The foldable iPhone is expected to feature a new frame made from a combination of titanium and aluminium. It is said to sport a 7.8-inch internal flexible display and a 5.5-inch cover screen. Apple packed an aluminium frame in the iPhone 17 Pro models. The iPhone Air has a titanium frame,
title: Apple’s Foldable iPhone Said to Be Equipped With Frame Made From Titanium and Aluminium

description: Google has expanded its AI-powered “Try It On” feature to include shoes, letting users preview how footwear would look on them before buying. The tool generates realistic images by asking users to upload a full-length photo. The process mirrors Google’s apparel try-on tool, where users select a shoe listing, tap “Try It On,” and view or share the results. The update builds on Google’s earlier AI clothing try-ons, making online shopping more interactive and personalised.
title: Google’s AI Shopping Feature Now Includes AI-Powered Virtual Shoe Try-Ons

description: Lava Shark 2 is expected to go official in India soon as the successor to the Lava Shark 5G. Ahead of launch, the company has revealed details about the handset’s display. It is teased to sport a panel that is larger than 6 inches and supports HD+ resolution with a high refresh rate. The company. Previously, had revealed the design of the Lava Shark 2 along with details about its camera system.
title: Lava Shark 2 Display Specifications Revealed Ahead of Launch in India

description: South Africans can now make everyday purchases using cryptocurrency at nearly 700,000 retail outlets nationwide. Through a partnership between Luno Pay, MoneyBadger, and the Scan to Pay network, consumers can pay with Bitcoin and stablecoins at major chains. Transactions are instantly converted, shielding merchants from volatility risks. This rollout marks one of the most significant expansions of crypto payments in Africa’s retail sector.
title: Luno Pay Partners Scan to Pay to Support Crypto Payments at 700,000 Retail Outlets in South Africa

description: Realme on Thursday announced a strategic partnership with camera equipment company Ricoh to bring the tradition of conventional cameras into mobile photography. As part of this collaboration, the two brands will work together to develop imaging systems for Realme handsets, offering deep customisation which is claimed to mimic the feel of a RICOH GR camera. Consequently, the first co-created product will be launched with the Realme GT 8 Pro later this month.
title: Realme Announces Ricoh Imaging Partnership as Realme GT 8 Pro Launch Approaches

description: iQOO 15 launch date in China was announced on Thursday. The handset is expected to arrive as the successor to the iQOO 13. Ahead of launch, the China-based smartphone manufacturer has also revealed its colourways and design of the phone. It is teased to be available in four colour options, with one of them featuring a dual-pattern design. The iQOO 15, notably, is already confirmed to be the first handset from the company to be powered by Qualcomm's new Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: iQOO 15 China Launch Date Announced; Colourways, Design Revealed Ahead of Debut

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G is set to go official in India soon. Arriving as the successor to the Galaxy M16 5G, the handset is expected to bring several upgrades in tow. It may be offered in two colourways. The company has already confirmed several details about the handset in the days leading up to its launch. From launch date and expected price in India to features and specifications, here's everything we know about the Samsung Galaxy M17 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G Launch Date, Expected Price in India: Check Design Specifications, Features, and More
